sources.name: Employees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employees

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployees

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Exists1 sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
TypeConversions1, TypeConversions exists(TypeConversions1@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID ||
Employees@RegionCode == DimEmployees@RegionCode ||
Employees@StatusCode == DimEmployees@StatusCode || 
Employees@FunctionCode == DimEmployees@FunctionCode ||
Employees@GradeLevel == DimEmployees@GradeLevel ||
Employees@RoleCode == DimEmployees@RoleCode ||
Employees@StartDt == DimEmployees@StartDt ||
Employees@EndDt == DimEmployees@EndDt
,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
